deDE: Geo Enchanters are specially attuned to the element of earth and the art of alchemy; through her studies, they can use magic and replicate some of the other elements powers.
enGB: Geo Enchanters are specially attuned to the element of earth and the art of alchemy; through her studies, they can use magic and replicate some of the other elements powers.

zhCN: Geo Enchanters are specially attuned to the element of earth and the art of alchemy; through her studies, they can use magic and replicate some of the other elements powers.

deDE: A Geo Enchanter adds their {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:modfier}modfier{/g} to their AC
enGB: A Geo Enchanter adds their {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:modfier}modfier{/g} to their AC
esES: A Geo Enchanter adds their {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:modfier}modfier{/g} to their AC
frFR: A Geo Enchanter adds their {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:modfier}modfier{/g} to their AC
itIT: A Geo Enchanter adds their {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:modfier}modfier{/g} to their AC
ptBR: A Geo Enchanter adds their {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:modfier}modfier{/g} to their AC
ruRU: A Geo Enchanter adds their {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:modfier}modfier{/g} to their AC
zhCN: A Geo Enchanter adds their {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:modfier}modfier{/g} to their AC

deDE: At 1st level, a Geo Enchanter can overexert herself to channel more power than normal, pushing past the limit of what is safe by accepting burn. Some of her wild talents allow her to accept burn in exchange for a greater effect, while others require her to accept a certain amount of burn to use that talent at all. For each point of burn she accepts, they take a penalty of 1 to their wisdom saving throws and LoreNature and LoreReligion checks. A kineticist can accept only 1 point of burn per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This limit rises to 2 points of burn at 6th level, and rises by 1 additional point every 3 levels thereafter. A kineticist can't choose to accept burn if it would put her total number of points of burn higher than (2 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier), though she can be forced to accept more burn from a source outside her control.

deDE:
At 3rd level, a kineticist's body surges with energy whenever she accepts burn. In addition, she receives a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on her {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} with kinetic blasts equal to the total number of points of burn she currently has, to a maximum bonus of +1 for every 3 kineticist levels she possesses. She also receives a bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with her kinetic blast equal to double the bonus on attack rolls.
As a kineticist's body becomes more and more suffused with her element, she begins to gain more powerful benefits.
Starting at 6th level, whenever she has at least 3 points of burn, the kineticist gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Alchemical}alchemical{/g} bonus to Wisdom and to either Dexterity or Constitution {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} of her choice. She also gains a chance to ignore the effects of a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} or sneak attack equal to 5% for every current point of burn.
At 11th level, whenever the kineticist has at least 5 points of burn, the wisdom bonus increase to a +4 Alchemical bonus.
At 16th level, whenever the kineticist has at least 7 points of burn, these bonuses increase to a +6 alchemical bonus to Wisdom , a +4 alchemical bonus either Dexterity or Constituion, and a +2 to the other one.

deDE:
You surround yourself with chunks of earth, Metal, or both that protects you from harm. These can either cover your body, functioning as armor, or float around you and block {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, functioning as a shield. It grants either a +4 armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} or a +2 shield bonus to AC, and you can change the type of bonus as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 kineticist levels you possess beyond 2nd. By accepting 1 point of burn, You can increase the bonus by 1 until the next time your burn is removed. You can increase the bonus multiple times in this way, but it can't be increased by more than 50% of its starting value.
When you change the shroud to grant a shield bonus, any bonus in excess of this limit doesn't apply, but it remains if you change the shroud's bonus type again.
enGB:

This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 kineticist levels you possess beyond 2nd. By accepting 1 point of burn, You can increase the bonus by 1 until the next time your burn is removed. You can increase the bonus multiple times in this way, but it can't be increased by more than 50% of its starting value.

You surround yourself with chunks of earth, Metal, or both that protects you from harm. These can either cover your body, functioning as armor, or float around you and block {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, functioning as a shield. It grants either a +4 armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} or a +2 shield bonus to AC, and you can change the type of bonus as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 kineticist levels you possess beyond 2nd. By accepting 1 point of burn, You can increase the bonus by 1 until the next time your burn is removed. You can increase the bonus multiple times in this way, but it can't be increased by more than 50% of its starting value.
When you change the shroud to grant a shield bonus, any bonus in excess of this limit doesn't apply, but it remains if you change the shroud's bonus type again.

deDE: You can use your Wisdom mofifier instead of your charisma for skill checks

ruRU: You can use your Wisdom mofifier instead of your charisma for skill checks
zhCN: You can use your Wisdom mofifier instead of your charisma for skill checks

deDE: You add 1.5 times your Wisdom mofifier to your Intelligence and Charisma as Competences bonuses
enGB: You add 1.5 times your Wisdom mofifier to your Intelligence and Charisma as Competences bonuses

deDE:
At 3rd mythic rank, the Azata receives the ability to cast mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. They can either choose to take it as part of an existing full divine spellcaster spellbook, or as a standalone spellbook.
A standalone spellbook has an independent progression and spell slots. The number of its spell slots can't be increased with the Abundant Casting mythic ability.
In the case of merging spellbooks, the maximum {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} of the spells within the spellbook is 30, and you can use spell slots from the original spellbook to cast mythic spells. Raising the caster level makes spells more powerful. The number of spell slots can be increased with the Abundant Casting mythic ability. Spontaneous spellcasters get new known spells from their original class and from their mythic path independently: the original class's progression doesn't change, and every mythic rank increase gives additional known spells.
If you are multiclassing, it is recommended to use the standalone spellbook.

deDE: The infusion discovery allows an Geo Enchanter to use her extracts not only on himself but on other people as well. With this discovery, all Geo Enchanter extracts will behave exactly like {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of the same names when considering targets and range.
enGB: The infusion discovery allows an Geo Enchanter to use her extracts not only on himself but on other people as well. With this discovery, all Geo Enchanter extracts will behave exactly like {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of the same names when considering targets and range.

deDE: At 7th level, a Geo Enchanter can use her abilities to wrack a target within 30 feet, harming the target by manipulating the metal in its blood. The target takes half the normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of the Geo Enchater's blast, and can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} to reduce that amount to 1/4 normal damage, but the damage is untyped and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. This is a 1st-level form infusion that costs 0 points of burn and can be used with Metal Blast.

deDE: At 15th level, a Geo Enchanter can infuse her blasts with the ability to manipulate her opponent's insides to the point of impairing their function. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}, the target is {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} for 1 minute. This is a 4th-level substance infusion that costs 3 points of burn and can be used with Metal blasts.
